lead_paragraph: TOBACCO-RAISING IN NEW YORK.-- Many of our readers, probably, are not aware that tobacco is raised, to a considerable extent, in the interior of this State. It is said to stand the frost better than corn, which is one among the reasons which have made it a favorite crop with many farmers. It is estimated that about sixteen hundred acres of land have been occupied by this crop, the present year, in Onondaga County, alone.
